title: Muting Your Entire Team
body:
This is what is has come down to because no matter how you play or what you do there will always be one. Always one piece of sh*t who puts you on tilt. No need to strategize in chat so just use your pings. Riot should remove chat for entire day and see how the toxicity level of everyone goes down. Legit you don't need to talk to your team because no one listens anyway!

That is all.
